scripts.publish:major: lerna version major --no-push -y && lerna publish from-package -y
scripts.publish:minor: lerna version minor --no-push -y && lerna publish from-package -y
scripts.publish:patch: lerna version patch --no-push -y && lerna publish from-package -y
scripts.publish:prepatch: lerna version prepatch --no-push -y && lerna publish from-package -y
scripts.update-k8s-credentials: doctl kubernetes cluster kubeconfig save rollem-115-sfo2
scripts.infra:delete:evicted: kubectl get pods | grep Evicted | awk '{print $1}' | xargs kubectl delete pod
